summary: Three young conspiracy theorists attempt to uncover the mysteries of Area 51, the government's secret location rumored to have hosted encounters with alien beings. What they find at this hidden facility exposes unimaginable secrets.
cast: Reid Warner|Darrin Bragg|Ben Rovner|Jelena Nik|Roy Abramsohn|Frank Novak|Glenn Campbell|Connie West|James Decker|Patrick Sullivan|David Thornsberry|Jenna Thornsberry|Amelia Thornsberry|Wray Featherstone|Sandra Staggs|Jennefer Folsom|Suze Lanier-Bramlett|Saxton Cole Hurley|Bradley Laise|Jonathan Hausfater|Matt Hausfater|Kara Lindquist|Matthew Rowland|Jolene Andersen|Jamel King|Robin Tweed|Victor Dante|Christopher Frederick|Russ Taylor|David Saucedo|Norio Hayakawa|Stephen Bassett|Steven Barton|Keith Blomberg|George Knapp|Jonathan Marsh
title: Area 51
